message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm interested in making a deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1000000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $1025000. This is still a great deal considering the product's worth to you is $1000000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $980000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1000000.

I understand your desire to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $1015000. This is still a great deal considering the product's worth to you is $1000000.
I appreciate your willingness to make one last compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable going above $980000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price.
